original_text: And Samuel said to all the people, See ye him whom the Lord hath chosen, that there is none like him among all the people? And all the people shouted, and said, God save the king.
korean_text: 사무엘이 모든 백성에게 이르되 너희는 여호와께서 택하신 자를 보느냐 모든 백성 중에 짝할 이가 없느니라 하니 모든 백성이 왕의 만세를 외쳐 부르니라

sentences.original_text: And Samuel said to all the people
See ye him whom the Lord hath chosen
that there is none like him
and said, God save the king.
